nvalid.help: Minimum number of coherent IFGs for a single pixel. If zero, pixel should be coherent in all IFGs.

netramp.help: Network deramp. Remove ramps from IFGs in a network sense.

gpsramp.help: GPS deramping. Use GPS network information to correct ramps.

stnlist.help: Station list for position of GPS stations.

stntype.help: Type of station list. False for Sopac, True for (Name,Lat,Lon), velocity for (Name,lat,lon,ve,vn,vu)

gpspath.help: Directory that stores the files for SOPAC or full path of the velotable.

gpstype.help: Type of data that is provided. Can be sopac or velocity.

gpsvert.help: Use vertical components from the GPS data.

gpsmodel.help: Use SOPAC model header for the GPS stations.

gpspreproc.help: Preprocess and smoothen the data using before using.

gpspad.help: Number of pixels around GPS station to be averaged for comparison.

gpsmin.help: Minimum number of GPS needed for ramp correction.

demerr.help: Correct for DEM Error. Use in case when IFGs

regularize.help: Regularization of the inverted time-series, if

masterdate.help: SAR acquisition to be chosen as time zero. If none, first acquisition is used.

filterlen.help: Width of the Gaussian filter used for smoothing final time-series

tropomin.help: Minimum scale to be analyzed for empirical tropospheric corrections.

tropomax.help: Maximum scale to be analyzed for empirical tropospheric corrections.

tropolooks.help: Number of additional looks to be applied before estimating tropospheric parameters.
